name: Mad Hatter Party Slots
description:
Play as Alice in Wonderland, with the Mad Hatter as your guide as you SLOT your way through the story of her return home from the fantastical dream world of Wonderland. Visit the locations and characters from the story and most importantly spin your way to huge jackpots! Remember with risk comes great reward!


• Go down the Rabbit hole and unlock 10 chapters of the story, each consisting of 10 missions to slot and spin your way through.

• Spin the slot machines against opponents by placing bets to earn credits, perform attacks and win!

• Test your luck: each slot machine becomes more challenging as you advance deeper in the game.

• Invite Facebook friends and gift them with free credits as you watch their progress on the wonderland map.

• Gain bonuses and power-ups as you progress through the story.
